original_text: Once when Jacob was cooking some stew, Esau came in from the open country, famished.
korean_text: 야곱이 죽을 쑤었더니 에서가 들에서 돌아와서 심히 피곤하여

sentences.original_text: Once when Jacob was cooking some stew
sentences.korean_translation: 어느 때 야곱이 스튜를 요리하고 있을 때

sentences.original_text: Esau came in from the open country
